site_url.description: The URL of the site for which the search analytics data is being reported.

search_type.description: The type of search (web search, image search, video search, etc.) for which the data is being reported.

date.description: The date for which the search analytics data is being reported.

country.description: The country for which the search analytics data is being reported.

clicks.description: The number of times users clicked on the search result for a specific country.

impressions.description: The total number of times a search result was shown in search results for a specific country.

ctr.description: The click-through rate, i.e., the ratio of clicks to impressions for a specific country.

position.description: The average position at which the site's search result appeared for a specific country.
